sentences.english: Those metal utensils are jingling as the car bumps along.
sentences.chinese: 顛簸，那些金屬器皿在玎璫作響。

sentences.english: This ware is suitable for decorative purpose but unsuitable for utility.
All the church plate has been locked up.
sentences.chinese: 教堂用的金銀器皿都鎖起來了。

sentences.english: Altogether, the silver dishes weighed two thousand four hundred shekels, according to the sanctuary shekel.
sentences.chinese: 一切器皿的銀子，按聖所的平，共有二千四百。

sentences.english: Would you bring a one-gallon container?
sentences.chinese: 你會帶一個一加侖的器皿嗎？

sentences.english: Pots that possess animal-like characteristics seem to carry a life of their own.
sentences.chinese: 擁有動物造型的陶瓷器皿像是帶有生命的。

sentences.english: Since you don' t use any utensils to eat, you can use this bread to scoop up the curry or rice.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用麪包來盛咖喱粉和米飯而省去了器皿。

sentences.english: They sought out potters who had once made copies of the ancient vessels.
sentences.chinese: 他們尋找曾經仿製過古代器皿的陶工。

sentences.english: Just a cleansed channel For Thy life through me.
sentences.chinese: 作一潔淨器皿，流出袮生命。

sentences.english: Then he said, Go, borrow thee vessels abroad of all thy neighbours, even empty vessels; borrow not a few.
sentences.chinese: 以利沙說，你去，向你衆鄰舍借空器皿，不要少借。

sentences.english: Elisha said, 'Go around and ask all your neighbors for empty jars. Don't ask for just a few.
sentences.chinese: 以利沙說，你去，向你衆鄰舍借空器皿，不要少借。

sentences.english: Some utensils were in a state of decay when they were unearthed.
sentences.chinese: 有些器皿在出土時已經殘破。

sentences.english: Good dishes should be better light transmission and no impurities.
sentences.chinese: 好的器皿應該透光性較佳且無雜質。

sentences.english: Grease the tin with butter before baking the cake.
sentences.chinese: 烘蛋糕之前先給白鐵器皿底部塗上一層黃油。

sentences.english: Glassware must be handled with care.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃器皿必須輕拿輕放。

sentences.english: They boxed the glassware and books before the movers came.
sentences.chinese: 在搬運傢俱的人到來之前他們將玻璃器皿和書籍裝箱。
